text: PhasmomantellaVermeersch XHC (2018) Phasmomantella gen. nov., a spectacular new genus of praying mantis from southern Central Vietnam (Mantodea, Mantidae, Deroplatyinae, Euchomenellini). European Journal of Taxonomy 442: 1–17. is an genus of praying mantids placed in the tribe Euchomenellini and family Deroplatyidae. The two known species appear to be endemic to Vietnam.Mantodea Species File (Version 5.0/5.0: retrieved 2 September 2019) == Species == The Mantodea Species File lists: * Phasmomantella pallida (Roy, 2001) - reassigned from Euchomenella (Nha Trang, Vietnam) * Phasmomantella nuichuana – type species (Núi Chúa National Park, Vietnam) == References == == External Links== * Category:Mantodea genera Category:Insects of Southeast Asia
title: Phasmomantella
